info.ganglia
Class GMonitor

java.lang.Object
  info.ganglia.GMonitor

public class GMonitor
extends java.lang.Object

A Java interface that creates and updates metrics via Ganglia. At instantiation of a GMetric this sends a metadata packet with information for creating the Ganglia graph. At a specified period of time (in seconds) will iterate through all monitored Metrics and send a packet containing the updated value to the connector. If no period is specified in the constructor the default period of 60 seconds is used. Not compatible with previous versions of Ganglia.

Constructor Summary
GMonitor()
          Constructor uses the default monitoring period to set update period and will use the multicastAddress specified in the System environment variable "ganglia.host" for its connection to Ganglia.
GMonitor(long period)
          Constructor uses monitoring period argument to set update period and will use the multicastAddress specified in the System environment variable "ganglia.host" for its connection to Ganglia.
GMonitor(java.lang.String multicastAddress)
          Constructor uses default monitoring period to set update period and will use the multicastAddress argument for its connection to ganglia.
GMonitor(java.lang.String multicastAddress, long period)
          Constructor uses the multicastAddress argument for its connection to ganglia and will use the monitoring period argument for time between value updates being sent

Method Detail

createGMetric

public Metricable createGMetric(java.lang.String host,
                                java.lang.String name,
                                java.lang.String type,
                                java.lang.String units,
                                int slope,
                                boolean clearValues)
Given the Metric type this creates a type specific GMetric implementation and adds it to the list of metrics to be monitored. Upon creation sendGMetricInit and sendGMetricUpdate are called.

Parameters:
host - The hostname of the client server
name - The name of the metric (e.g. "CPU Usage"). Shows on graph
type - The type of the value. See GMetric constants.
units - The units used to measure the metric. Shows on graph
slope - See GMetric constants.
additive - If false the GMetric values are reset to 0 after update. If true the GMetric values are additive.
Returns:

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
Usage: java -jar GangliaMetrics.jar multicastAddress

Parameters:
args -
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
